text: I've got a form with no required fields, but I want to check that at least one is filled out before the user submits it. Calling `e.preventDefault()` or doing `return false` in `$("#form").on("submit", ".hs-form", function (e) { ... });` doesn't seem to do it, though my function is running. Is there a way to prevent form submission in a HS form?
I know there's an `onFormSubmit` property in the form create function, but this is on a template builder page and to be able to add onFormSubmit, I would have to switch away from a form module
I'm not certain that returning false on that would prevent submission, anyway
I feel like I must be missing something obvious
